curriculum.title: Zordic Music Studio: High School Music Production Curriculum

units.title: Fundamentals of Sound and Music
units.description: Understanding the building blocks of music and sound

lessons.title: Introduction to Sound Waves
learningObjectives: Understand the physics of sound waves and how they create music
Identify frequency, amplitude, and wavelength in audio
Recognize how digital audio represents analog sound
Use Zordic's wave visualizer to see sound in real-time

interactiveExercises.name: Wave Explorer
interactiveExercises.description: Manipulate sine waves using Zordic's oscillator to hear frequency changes

interactiveExercises.name: Frequency Hunt
interactiveExercises.description: Identify different frequencies in everyday sounds using spectrum analyzer

interactiveExercises.name: Amplitude Control
interactiveExercises.description: Create dynamic volume changes and understand decibels

creativeChallenge.title: Create Your Sonic Signature
creativeChallenge.description: Design a unique 5-second sound using only basic waveforms that represents your personality

lessons.title: Rhythm, Beats, and Time
learningObjectives: Understand BPM (beats per minute) and its role in music
Create simple rhythmic patterns using Zordic's drum grid
Recognize rhythmic elements in popular music

interactiveExercises.name: BPM Explorer
interactiveExercises.description: Feel different tempos and match them to music genres

interactiveExercises.name: Time Signature Detective
interactiveExercises.description: Listen to songs and identify their time signatures

interactiveExercises.name: Grid Master
interactiveExercises.description: Program beats on the Zordic grid sequencer

creativeChallenge.title: Rhythm Around the World
creativeChallenge.description: Create a 16-bar rhythmic pattern inspired by a world music genre
requirements: Set appropriate BPM for the genre
Use at least 4 different percussion sounds

lessons.title: Music Theory Fundamentals
learningObjectives: Identify notes on a musical keyboard and staff
Understand intervals and their emotional qualities
Apply theory concepts in Zordic's piano roll

interactiveExercises.name: Note Navigator
interactiveExercises.description: Learn note names and positions on keyboard

interactiveExercises.name: Interval Ear Training
interactiveExercises.description: Identify intervals by sound and emotional quality

interactiveExercises.name: Scale Builder
interactiveExercises.description: Construct major and minor scales in different keys

creativeChallenge.title: Emotional Journey
creativeChallenge.description: Create two 8-bar melodies: one happy (major) and one sad (minor)
requirements: Use C major scale for happy melody
Use A minor scale for sad melody
Include at least one octave range

lessons.title: Tones and Timbre
learningObjectives: Understand what makes instruments sound different
Explore different synth waveforms and their timbres
Design basic sounds using Zordic's synthesizer

interactiveExercises.name: Timbre Detective
interactiveExercises.description: Identify instruments by their unique timbres

interactiveExercises.name: Waveform Workshop
interactiveExercises.description: Compare sine, square, sawtooth, and triangle waves

interactiveExercises.name: Sound Designer
interactiveExercises.description: Create 5 different timbres using basic synthesis

creativeChallenge.title: Synth Sound Library
creativeChallenge.description: Design a collection of 8 distinct synth sounds for different musical purposes
requirements: Create: bass, lead, pad, pluck sounds (2 of each)
Use different waveforms for each category

unitProject.title: Sonic Foundation Portfolio
unitProject.description: Demonstrate mastery of sound fundamentals through a creative portfolio
deliverables: Rhythmic composition in 3 different time signatures
Custom sound library with 10 unique timbres

units.title: Beat Making and Production
units.description: Creating professional drum patterns and percussive grooves

lessons.title: Drum Patterns and Percussion
learningObjectives: Identify basic drum kit components (kick, snare, hi-hat)
Create foundational drum patterns for different genres
Understand drum programming in Zordic's step sequencer
Apply swing and groove to patterns

interactiveExercises.name: Drum Kit Explorer
interactiveExercises.description: Learn each drum element's role in a beat

interactiveExercises.name: Pattern Library
interactiveExercises.description: Program classic drum patterns: rock, hip-hop, EDM

interactiveExercises.name: Groove Workshop
interactiveExercises.description: Add swing and humanization to mechanical beats

creativeChallenge.title: Genre Mashup Beat
creativeChallenge.description: Create a drum pattern that combines elements from 2 different genres
requirements: 32-bar pattern with A and B sections

lessons.title: Layering Sounds
learningObjectives: Understand frequency ranges and layering strategy
Stack drum sounds for fuller impact
Use EQ to separate layered elements

interactiveExercises.name: Frequency Map
interactiveExercises.description: Visualize where different sounds sit in the spectrum

interactiveExercises.name: Kick Layering
interactiveExercises.description: Combine multiple kick drums for powerful low end

interactiveExercises.name: EQ Carving
interactiveExercises.description: Use EQ to make layered sounds work together

creativeChallenge.title: Super Drum Designer
creativeChallenge.description: Design 3 custom drum sounds using layering techniques
requirements: Create: super kick, mega snare, hybrid clap

lessons.title: Creating Grooves
learningObjectives: Understand what makes a beat groove
Use ghost notes and accent patterns

interactiveExercises.name: Groove Analysis
interactiveExercises.description: Deconstruct famous grooves to understand their magic

interactiveExercises.name: Ghost Note Master
interactiveExercises.description: Add subtle ghost notes to create movement

interactiveExercises.name: Fill Factory
interactiveExercises.description: Create effective drum fills and transitions

creativeChallenge.title: The Perfect Loop
creativeChallenge.description: Create an 8-bar drum groove that loops seamlessly with maximum groove
requirements: Design a fill that transitions between variations

lessons.title: Using Samplers
learningObjectives: Apply sampler techniques to beat making

interactiveExercises.name: Sample Safari
interactiveExercises.description: Record and process environmental sounds

interactiveExercises.name: Chop Shop
interactiveExercises.description: Slice and rearrange audio samples creatively

interactiveExercises.name: Melodic Sampler
interactiveExercises.description: Create a playable instrument from a single sample

creativeChallenge.title: Found Sound Beat
creativeChallenge.description: Create a complete beat using only samples you recorded yourself
requirements: Create kick, snare, hi-hat from recordings
Include a melodic element from samples

unitProject.title: Create a Simple Beat
unitProject.description: Produce a professional-quality beat demonstrating all beat-making skills
deliverables: 32-bar beat with intro, main sections, and outro
Layered drum sounds with proper EQ

units.title: Melody Creation
units.description: Composing memorable melodies and musical phrases

lessons.title: Scale Selection and Key
learningObjectives: Understand major, minor, and modal scales
Choose appropriate scales for different moods
Use Zordic's scale highlighting and snap features

interactiveExercises.name: Scale Emotion Wheel
interactiveExercises.description: Match scales to emotional qualities

interactiveExercises.name: Modal Explorer
interactiveExercises.description: Discover the character of each mode

interactiveExercises.name: Key Consistency
interactiveExercises.description: Compose melodies that stay in key

creativeChallenge.title: Modal Journey
creativeChallenge.description: Create 7 short melodies, one in each mode of the major scale
requirements: Same root note for all modes (e.g., all C)

lessons.title: Melodic Composition
learningObjectives: Develop melodies through repetition and variation

interactiveExercises.name: Motif Development
interactiveExercises.description: Create and evolve a simple musical idea

interactiveExercises.name: Contour Analysis
interactiveExercises.description: Study and recreate melodic shapes from famous songs

interactiveExercises.name: Call and Response
interactiveExercises.description: Create question-answer melodic phrases

creativeChallenge.title: The Hook Challenge
creativeChallenge.description: Compose a catchy 4-bar hook that people can't forget
requirements: Test on 3 people - can they sing it back?

lessons.title: Lead and Bass Lines
learningObjectives: Distinguish between lead and bass line roles
Design bass lines that support harmony
Balance lead and bass in a mix

interactiveExercises.name: Lead Melody Workshop
interactiveExercises.description: Craft expressive lead lines with dynamics

interactiveExercises.name: Bass Line Builder
interactiveExercises.description: Create groovy, foundational bass patterns

interactiveExercises.name: Lead-Bass Interaction
interactiveExercises.description: Make lead and bass complement each other

creativeChallenge.title: Genre Fusion Instrumental
creativeChallenge.description: Create a 16-bar instrumental with distinct lead and bass
requirements: Catchy lead melody with clear phrasing
Groovy bass line that locks with drums
Proper sound design for both elements

lessons.title: Synthesizer Basics
learningObjectives: Design lead and bass sounds from scratch

interactiveExercises.name: ADSR Explorer
interactiveExercises.description: Master envelope parameters for different sounds

interactiveExercises.name: Filter Fundamentals
interactiveExercises.description: Understand filter types and resonance

interactiveExercises.name: Synth Recreation
interactiveExercises.description: Recreate famous synth sounds by ear

creativeChallenge.title: Synth Preset Pack
creativeChallenge.description: Design a collection of 12 original synthesizer presets

unitProject.title: Compose a Melody
unitProject.description: Create an original instrumental composition showcasing melodic skills

units.title: Harmony & Arrangement
units.description: Building harmonic structures and arranging complete songs

lessons.title: Chord Progressions
learningObjectives: Learn common chord progressions (I-IV-V, ii-V-I, etc.)
Use Zordic's chord tools for harmonic composition

interactiveExercises.name: Chord Builder
interactiveExercises.description: Construct chords from scales

interactiveExercises.name: Progression Detective
interactiveExercises.description: Identify progressions in popular songs

interactiveExercises.name: Harmony Generator
interactiveExercises.description: Create original progressions for different moods

creativeChallenge.title: Progression Portfolio
creativeChallenge.description: Create 5 chord progressions for different emotional contexts
requirements: Include one borrowed chord or modal interchange

lessons.title: Harmonic Layering
learningObjectives: Use pads, chords, and arpeggios together

interactiveExercises.name: Voicing Workshop
interactiveExercises.description: Create different voicings of the same chord

interactiveExercises.name: Texture Builder
interactiveExercises.description: Layer pads, chords, and arpeggios

interactiveExercises.name: Frequency Management
interactiveExercises.description: EQ harmonic layers for clarity

creativeChallenge.title: Harmonic Landscape
creativeChallenge.description: Create a 16-bar harmonic composition with multiple layers

lessons.title: Song Structure
learningObjectives: Understand common song forms (verse-chorus, AABA, etc.)
Build energy and dynamics throughout a song

interactiveExercises.name: Form Analysis
interactiveExercises.description: Map the structure of popular songs

interactiveExercises.name: Transition Techniques
interactiveExercises.description: Create smooth section transitions

interactiveExercises.name: Energy Architect
interactiveExercises.description: Design energy flow across full song

creativeChallenge.title: Full Song Blueprint
creativeChallenge.description: Design a complete song structure with detailed arrangement plan

lessons.title: Mixing Basics
learningObjectives: Create space and depth in a mix

interactiveExercises.name: Level Setting
interactiveExercises.description: Create balanced volume relationships

interactiveExercises.name: Panorama Placement
interactiveExercises.description: Use stereo field for separation and width

interactiveExercises.name: EQ Fundamentals
interactiveExercises.description: Use EQ to create clarity and space

creativeChallenge.title: Mix Rescue
creativeChallenge.description: Take a poorly mixed project and transform it into a professional mix

unitProject.title: Full Song Production
unitProject.description: Produce a complete original song from start to finish
deliverables: Balanced and mixed to professional standard

units.title: Advanced Techniques
units.description: Professional production techniques and genre-specific skills

lessons.title: Effects Processing
learningObjectives: Understand reverb, delay, and spatial effects
Master effects routing and sends in Zordic

interactiveExercises.name: Reverb & Delay
interactiveExercises.description: Create space and depth with time-based effects

interactiveExercises.name: Compression Control
interactiveExercises.description: Shape dynamics and add punch

interactiveExercises.name: Modulation Magic
interactiveExercises.description: Use chorus, phaser, flanger creatively

criteria: Knows when to use each effect

creativeChallenge.title: FX Showcase
creativeChallenge.description: Create 4 versions of the same melody, each with distinct effects character

lessons.title: Automation and Dynamics
learningObjectives: Use automation to add movement and interest

interactiveExercises.name: Volume Automation
interactiveExercises.description: Create musical dynamics through level changes

interactiveExercises.name: Filter Sweeps
interactiveExercises.description: Automate filters for builds and transitions

interactiveExercises.name: Parameter Motion
interactiveExercises.description: Automate multiple parameters for evolving sounds

creativeChallenge.title: The Perfect Build
creativeChallenge.description: Create an 8-bar build-up using only automation (no new elements)
requirements: Create maximum impact at the drop

lessons.title: Genre-Specific Production
learningObjectives: Understand production techniques for different genres
Apply genre-specific sound design and mixing
Recognize genre conventions and how to innovate
Produce in at least 3 different genres

interactiveExercises.name: Genre Analysis
interactiveExercises.description: Deconstruct production elements of different genres

interactiveExercises.name: EDM Production
interactiveExercises.description: Create signature EDM elements (drops, builds, bass)

interactiveExercises.name: Hip-Hop Beats
interactiveExercises.description: Produce authentic hip-hop drums and sampling

creativeChallenge.title: Genre Mashup Track
creativeChallenge.description: Create a track that authentically combines 2 different genres
requirements: Written analysis of genre elements used

lessons.title: Collaboration and Remixing
learningObjectives: Understand collaborative workflow and file organization
Work with stems and project files from others
Create remixes that respect and transform originals
Use version control and project management

interactiveExercises.name: Stem Management
interactiveExercises.description: Organize and work with multi-track stems

interactiveExercises.name: Remix Techniques
interactiveExercises.description: Transform existing material creatively

interactiveExercises.name: Collaborative Project
interactiveExercises.description: Work on shared project with classmates

creativeChallenge.title: Collaborative Remix Project
creativeChallenge.description: Team up with 2 classmates to create a remix of a provided track

unitProject.title: Advanced Production Portfolio
unitProject.description: Create a diverse portfolio demonstrating advanced production skills

projectBasedLearning.title: Create a Simple Beat
projectBasedLearning.description: Design and produce an original beat from scratch

projectBasedLearning.title: Compose a Melody
projectBasedLearning.description: Create an original melodic composition with harmony

technical: At least 2 synthesized sounds from scratch

projectBasedLearning.title: Full Song Production
projectBasedLearning.description: Produce a complete original song from concept to final mix

technical: Clear structure (intro, verse, chorus, bridge, outro)
Professional mixing with EQ and dynamics
deliverables: Song analysis (structure, key, BPM, creative decisions)

projectBasedLearning.title: Music Video with Visuals
projectBasedLearning.description: Create an audio-visual experience combining music production with synchronized visuals
learningObjectives: Create music that supports visual narrative

technical: Synchronized visual elements (Zordic's visual engine or external)

projectBasedLearning.title: Collaborative Remix Project
projectBasedLearning.description: Collaborate with peers to remix an existing track
learningObjectives: Work effectively in a production team

deliverables: Team presentation of process and decisions

projectBasedLearning.title: Final Portfolio & Showcase
projectBasedLearning.description: Curate and present a comprehensive portfolio of work from the semester

technical: All projects professionally mixed and mastered

gradingScale.A: 90-100% - Exceeds expectations, shows mastery and creativity

criteria: Proper use of tools and techniques

agentFeatures.adaptiveDifficulty: Agents adjust complexity based on student performance
agentFeatures.progressTracking: Agents monitor student progress and adjust recommendations
agentFeatures.creativeSuggestions: Agents offer creative ideas while respecting student vision
agentFeatures.technicalAssistance: On-demand help with Zordic tools and features

pedagogicalApproach.learningTheory: Constructivist, project-based learning with agent scaffolding
principles: Learn by doing - hands-on production from day one
Creative expression - prioritize artistic voice alongside technical skills
Collaborative learning - peer interaction and teamwork
Reflective practice - regular self-assessment and documentation
Real-world application - professional workflows and standards

differentiation.advanced: Extension challenges, additional genre exploration, mentorship opportunities
differentiation.onLevel: Standard curriculum with agent adaptive support
differentiation.support: Additional scaffolding, simplified projects, extended timelines, increased agent assistance

inclusion.accessibility: Visual and audio feedback, adjustable interface, multiple learning modalities
inclusion.culturalResponsiveness: Diverse genre representation, culturally relevant examples
inclusion.studentChoice: Project topic flexibility, genre selection, creative direction autonomy
